name: Vanilla Skin Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmands.Key Notes:Sugar Crystals, Cashmere Wood, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:Familiar and delectable. Hypnotic and decadent. Vanilla Skin, unlike any vanilla fragrance, evokes an iconic creaminess wrapped in a kaleidoscope of spice and intrigue. The dual nature of pink pepper and sugar settles down through rich cashmere before nestling into a core of addictive vanilla and cozy sandalwood. Vanilla Skin is a multidimensional take on an intoxicating, sensual gourmand..About the Fragrance:.Clean
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum, Aqua, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Farnesol, Benzyl Alcohol...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray generously onto your wrists, neck, and pulse points; your body heat will help to diffuse fragrance as the day goes on..-PHLUR fragrances can be worn alone or layered with other PHLUR fragrances and body care products to create your own signature scent.
